pages.title: Spectacled Bear
pages.text: It is the only living species of bear native to South America, and the last remaining short-faced bear ($(o)subfamily Tremarctinae$()).$(br2)The diet of the spectacled bear is mostly herbivorous, but does engage in occasional carnivory.$(br2)The species is classified as Vulnerable by the IUCN because of habitat loss.

pages.title: Spectacled Bear
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Most active during Dawn/Dusk$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:apple$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 7 Days
